column4: Reflection: You are learning it is easy enough to make some bio materials. But...they are probably challenging
to design. Is there any safety concern or benefit to working with this material?
What is Kombucha? What does Kombucha leather look like? Show a bit of research.

column1: DOCUMENTS PROCESS OF MAKING KOMBUCHA LEATHER
column4: How do you turn what you have made into Leather? Where are you getting that info?
Show some examples of how this leather or plastic will be used.
